Benjamin Mendy shoots down Man City rumours

It didn’t take long for Mendy to shoot down the rumours, posting a video on Twitter to one of the biggest French football accounts.

Mendy’s video featured him clearly in Paris and the Monaco left back added the following message: “Manchester has changed… calm down lol”.

For what its worth, it would still be no surprise to see Mendy end up at Manchester City, perhaps there might be more stunts like this on the way…

For what its worth, it would still be no surprise to see Mendy end up at Manchester City, perhaps there might be more stunts like this on the way…

雜種狗黎

隨著意甲球季完結，由曼城外借至拖連奴的赫特亦告租約期滿，對於離隊他滿懷不捨之情，更稱過去一季的時間是他人生最難忘經歷。

相集︰托迪告別戰動人一刻

赫特在曼城不受新帥哥迪奧拿重用，結果遠走意甲。在拖連奴雖然仍有不少失誤，但離隊在即的他稱過去一季他畢生難忘：「多謝拖連奴，我很榮幸可以為這樣一間特別的球隊效力。我永不會忘記你們如何善待我及我家人。我人生餘下時間都會支持拖連奴。在這裡我遇到很多特別的人，這亦是我一生中最好的經歷。」

赫特今季共為拖連奴在意甲上陣36次，助球隊以第9名完成聯賽。（Goal.com）

隨著意甲球季完結，由曼城外借至拖連奴的赫特亦告租約期滿，對於離隊他滿懷不捨之情，更稱過去一季的時間是他人生最難忘經歷。

相集︰托迪告別戰動人一刻

赫特在曼城不受新帥哥迪奧拿重用，結果遠走意甲。在拖連奴雖然仍有不少失誤，但離隊在即的他稱過去一季他畢生難忘：「多謝拖連奴，我很榮幸可以為這樣一間特別的球隊效力。我永不會忘記你們如何善待我及我家人。我人生餘下時間都會支持拖連奴。在這裡我遇到很多特別的人，這亦是我一生中最好的經歷。」

赫特今季共為拖連奴在意甲上陣36次，助球隊以第9名完成聯賽。（http://Goal.com）

Manchester City are reportedly "confident" of landing Alexis Sanchez after holding talks in London regarding the Arsenal forward, despite the Gunners' preference that he join Bayern Munich if he were to leave the club.

Goal's Sam Lee reported City's director of football Txiki Begiristain travelled to the English capital for the talks, and while Arsenal have "resigned themselves" to his impending departure, "it has been made clear to City" they would rather he join the Bundesliga giants.

However, Sanchez reportedly wants to reunite with Sky Blues manager Pep Guardiola, and City will look to capitalise by matching any bid from Bayern and offering higher wages.

Mendy, who joined Monaco from Marseille last summer, looks the likely replacement for Gael Clichy, released after 6 years at the Etihad.

Whilst we understand no contracts have been signed, the 22-year old French international is thought to have chosen City over Liverpool, with a deal to be formalised in the coming days.

Ryan Bertrand and Kyle Walker and Arsenal’s Alexis Sanchez remain on Guardiola’s radar.

Manchester City have reportedly won the race to sign Monaco left-back Benjamin Mendy in a deal worth around £40million.

City boss Pep Guardiola has already raided the French Ligue 1 champions this summer having sealed a £43million swoop for playmaker Bernardo Silva last month.

And he has now set his sights on 22-year-old Mendy with the offer of a four-year contract worth £100k-a-week reportedly on the table at the Etihad Stadium.

The player is currently away on international duty with France, but it's being suggested that his transfer to City will be rubber-stamped later this month.

Guardiola is keen to bolster his left-back options with veteran Aleksandar Kolarov and Academy graduate Angelino his only available players ahead of next season.
Angelino
